page.title: 10Frocester Court Farm.
page.content: Today the farm is 260 acres and each year 18-20 acres of Kale,20-25 acres of Oats,20-25 acres of Wheat, 20 acres of Spring Barley are grown together with 180 acres of permanent pasture & grass ley.There is also a small area of woodland growing timber for use on the farm. The livestock at the time of our visit was 190'Clun'Ewes,290 lambs, 58 'Dairy Friesian'Cows,36 heifers and 14 calves. The farm is owned by Mr.Price and he runs the farm with the help of his 3 sons.A typical day begins with milking at 5am.and finishes after milking at 5 pm.Hay and Silage is made for winter feed.The Oats & Wheat are grown for seed but the Barley is milled and mixed into animal food on the farm. The sheep are lambed under cover and the cows are also housed in winter.
